mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.star, b.name as categoryName from admin_booth a left join admin_category b on b.id = a.category_id

SELECT a.position, a.license_url, b.name as marketRegionName, c.name as marketName FROM admin_booth a left join admin_market_region b on b.id = a.market_region_id left join admin_market c on c.id = b.market_id where a.id =#{id};
